meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Iran Cuts Jews' Jail Terms An appeals court in Iran reduced the sentences of 10 Iranian Jews who had been convicted of cooperating with Israel in a trial that drew relentless international scrutiny and widespread criticism.

Iran Cuts Jews' Jail Terms An appeals court in Iran reduced the sentences of 10 Iranian Jews who had been convicted of cooperating with Israel in a trial that drew relentless international scrutiny and widespread criticism.

Support for Peru's Leader Military leaders publicly backed President Alberto K. Fujimori on dismantling the intelligence service and calling new elections, muting fears that the armed forces might move to oust him.

Jabs Traded in Tire Case Firestone attacked the safety of Ford Explorers before a House panel as the companies criticized each other's products and tried to explain documents that lawmakers found incriminating.
